title: Interpretation of a dream about watering the ground in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing watering the earth in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing him watering crops or land in a dream means marriage or marriage, and God knows best. Likewise, if a person sees in his dream that he is watering the earth, this means ample sustenance and the removal of sorrows and adversities. Likewise, if An unmarried girl sees that she is sprinkling water on the ground, this indicates that she will soon marry someone she loves from among her relatives. Interpretation of seeing watering the ground in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is watering the ground, this means that her worries will go away and she will succeed and excel in her studies. Likewise, seeing Watering the land in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the final debts of her lover or fiancée to a nearby debtor, and God knows best. Seeing watering the land in a dream or watering crops means getting rid of sins and immoralities and returning and repenting to God Almighty. If the educational level of the unmarried girl is poor and she sees the crops being irrigated and the land If the married woman sees in her dream that she is watering the land in a dream, this indicates the approaching appearance of pregnancy in the coming period. Likewise, the dream of watering the land that is not suitable for cultivation means that Her husband lost his business, profit, and gains, and God knows best. Seeing watering the land in a married woman’s dream means that the disputes between her and her husband will be resolved and her husband will enter a job. Interpretation of seeing watering the land in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is watering the land and irrigating the crops, this means that Determining the date of her birth and the ease of her birth. Also, seeing irrigation of residential lands in a dream indicates a new job that her husband and Ali Salah Ahwal will join in reality, God willing. Interpretation of seeing watering the land in a dream for a man: If a single man sees in his dream that he is leveling the land and irrigating it with water, this indicates He will soon marry a good girl, God willing. In addition to seeing dry land cultivation in a dream, this vision indicates an end to worries, problems, and family disputes and an increase in trade profits. Also, seeing watering the land in a dream for a married man indicates the righteousness of Hula and his high status and the collapse of disputes between him and him. His wife. As for seeing the water cut off and the land dry, it indicates the financial condition that the dreamer is going through in the next period of his life and the refuge of Almighty God. Interpretation of a dream about watering dry land. Interpretation of seeing that you are being watered dry in a dream is one of the desired visions that indicate goodness, security, and improved conditions. Seeing an unmarried woman watering dry land in a dream is evidence that God will provide her with a good and happy marriage. Dreaming of watering dry land is a sign of kindness, happiness, general joys, and hearing good news. Interpretation of dreams about irrigating agricultural land. Dreaming of irrigating agricultural land is one of the dreams that indicate goodness. And safety and protection from God Almighty. It also means to see watered land in the dream of an afflicted person, and this is evidence

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing the king in a dream and talking to him

preview.html: Seeing the king in a dream and talking to him is one of the good and praiseworthy visions that indicates various blessings and abundant food that the fortuneteller will receive in many forms, such as abundant financial sustenance that provides him with a decent life and the maintenance of work and study, but a conversation with the king can also indicate important actions or A certain rebuke, so seeing the king in a dream has multiple and varied interpretations. Seeing the king in a dream and talking to him. The precise interpretation of this vision depends on the personality of the king who shook hands with him, the way the hands were given, and the way he spoke. Seeing the king in a dream is one of the visions that express his desire Dreaming of gaining fame and excellence in one field, but he lacks the determination and abilities necessary for that. Also, talking to the king seriously reflects the many problems and crises that he faces in the current period and he needs a lot of help to solve them. As for whoever sees the king shouting at him, this is evidence of He angers his parents with the actions he commits that contradict his religion, morals, and customs that he grew up with. While seeing someone giving both hands to the king, this indicates that the dreamer is on the cusp of a major promotion in his life or that he has assumed a prestigious position in one of the international companies, whether inside or outside Egypt. Seeing the king in a dream and talking to him Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing the king in a dream and shaking his hand indicates a change in many of the current conditions in the country in which the dreamer and his family live. One of the unjust rulers can change and be replaced by a good ruler. Also, shaking hands with kings and talking to them indicates that the dreamer has reached a great degree of knowledge. He likes to look beyond science and seeks to learn all the new skills and knowledge of different cultures and sciences. Also, seeing the king indicates And the court around him indicates a big leap in the good transformations that the dreamer will soon witness at all levels. Interpretation of seeing the king in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi According to Al-Nabulsi, in the interpretation of seeing the king in a dream, whoever sees this in his dream expresses what he will achieve in his life in terms of a prominent position in society and confirmation that he He will receive a lot of goodness and abundance. Sustenance, and that he will gain great value and appreciation among people in many places. Likewise, whoever sees the king in his dream of marrying her, this in his vision is a sign of the high status that she will obtain from him and which she will not dream of throughout her life, and it is one of the most decent visions in her life. Everything in food is more than what he really wants. The symbol of King Salman in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Al-Osaimi confirmed that seeing King Salman in a dream is one of the visions that indicate a great abundance of sustenance and confirmation that the dreamer will receive a special promotion in his work that will elevate him and bring a lot of goodness and blessings. In life to a large extent. To a great extent. Likewise, a woman who sees King Salman in a dream, her vision indicates that she will receive blessings that she will not be the first than the last, and it is a confirmation that she will achieve a great rise in her status that there is no woman before him.

title: Interpretation of a dream about collecting eggs from under a chicken

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of the dream of collecting eggs from under the chicken for single, married and pregnant women, and see the opinions of scholars and dream interpreters included in the interpretation books. The interpretation of the dream of collecting eggs from under the chicken in a dream, was made by many leading interpreters, and we will present some of these interpretations on our website ( In dreams. Interpretation of a dream about collecting eggs from under a chicken. Seeing him collecting eggs from under a chicken in a dream for a man is evidence that his wife will soon give birth to a boy. A man who sees that his eggs are broken while picking them in a dream is a sign of this husband’s pressure on his wife. It may mean seeing A man collecting eggs from under a chicken in a dream indicates that his wife will become pregnant soon. Seeing a man collecting eggs from under a chicken in a dream is a sign that there are some problems for him or his family. A man who sees boiled eggs in his dream symbolizes the fulfillment of some desires and ambitions that he seeks. An unmarried woman who sees eggs in a dream indicates that there are many people and each one of them wants to propose to her. The interpretation of a dream about collecting eggs from under a hen for a single woman indicates that she has emotional balance and psychological health. Seeing eggs in a dream for a single woman is considered Also a sign of good health. Seeing a married woman collecting eggs in a dream means that she will become pregnant soon, God willing. See also: Seeing eggs in a dream Boiled eggs in a dream Seeing a married woman collecting a large number of eggs can also indicate the birth of a woman, and God knows best. Seeing broken eggs in a dream for a married woman may mean that there are rivalries and problems in her home. Seeing a married woman eating eggs in a dream is a sign that she will obtain a lot of sustenance and money. Seeing a lot of eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that she has given birth to a very beautiful female. Dream interpretation Washing dishes. Watch the video also: Interpretation of a dream about collecting eggs from under a chicken. We present to you the interpretation of a dream about collecting eggs from under a chicken, greetings from the site’s dream team.

title: Symbols of envy in a dream – Symbols that indicate envy and the evil eye in a dream

preview.html: Learn with us about the symbols of envy in a dream from the great dream interpreters. Watch summaries of visions and dreams that indicate envy for people who went through this experience in the past, and God healed them. He saw in their dreams symbols that indicate envy in a dream. Watch in this article the symptoms of the eye in a dream, and the signs of the eye. In a dream, symbols of the eye in a dream, and signs of envy in a dream. There are some symbols that you may see in a dream that are considered signs of the eye and envy in a dream. These visions warn from God Almighty that there is envy or evil in your body and you need to get rid of it. I read about that: Signs of the eye emerging from the womb. Signs of magical exit in a dream. Symbols that indicate envy in a dream. Here are some symbols that indicate envy or the eye in a dream: Seeing the eye in a dream, animal eye, or human eye. Seeing people in a dream looking at you with hatred or malice. Seeing a hole. Or the well - hole - hole - needles: indicates the eye. Also seeing camel meat inside the pot. Anything circular or ocular: indicates eye injury. Seeing water from the eye, especially if it is dirty. Seeing thieves in a dream: This is because they harm people and rob Their goods. Electricity - Camera lens - Photographer: also refers to the eye. Seeing Surat Al-Falaq or reading its verses: This indicates envy. Seeing meteorites and meteoroids. Seeing parts of the body that resemble the shape of the eyes, such as the navel. Seeing people in a dream known for envy. Seeing jinn and devils Because they are the ones who interfere with envy or the evil eye. Seeing the letter “Ain” or anything that refers to an eye, such as “Ayn Jalaun” or “the eyes of Moses,” and nothing like that. Seeing Jews or Christians: According to God Almighty’s saying: “Many of the People of the Book would like you to disbelieve after Your belief is motivated by envy.” And seeing the grave, death, or dead people, all of this indicates envy, as evidenced by his saying, may God bless him and grant him peace: “The eye puts the camel in the pot and the man in the grave.” See also: Symptoms of the eye and the method of treating it from the Qur’an and Sunnah. How to know what If it is a magic spell, a curse on you. Symbols of envy in the dream: Names of people whose eyes appear: Arrows: This is because the Prophet said: “The look is a poisoned arrow from the arrows of Satan.” Hamza: This name is closer to the name Hamza, because God Almighty said: (And say, “My Lord, I seek refuge in You.” From Hamza Al-Shayateen). Al-Ruqyah: warns the patient against treatment for envy or the evil eye. Tired or exhausted: This name symbolizes fatigue or illness. Al-Athar: This word is singular, Al-Athar, and this is what the eyewitness gets from the eye. See also: Symbols The dream shows a boy in a dream. These are some visions and dreams that indicate envy or the evil eye, and they are summaries of the visions of those who are afflicted with the evil eye and envy, and this is a vision that shows the evil eye itself. Seeing someone fighting you, expelling you, harming you, or chasing you. Seeing someone burning you is considered one of the worst types Eyes. Seeing someone gas eyes. Seeing someone giving you a nail. Seeing someone splashing water on you or trying to choke you while looking at you. Seeing someone trying to take off your clothes. Seeing someone pushing the door to let you in, whether they're entering the room or the bathroom. See also in

title: Interpretation of a rainbow in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Through the article we will learn about the interpretation of a rainbow in a dream for a single woman, as well as the interpretation of a dream about a rainbow after rain, as well as the interpretation of a rainbow in a dream for a married woman.Interpretation of a dream about a rainbow in a dream about a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees that she is looking at the sky and sees a rainbow In a dream, she saw it with joy. The dream indicates that she will hear good news in the coming period of her life, and God Almighty knows best. And if the unmarried girl sees the sky raining, then the sun appears with its bright light, and a rainbow appears in the sunlight. The dream shows that she gains safety from fear. And she will gain security and peace in her life, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi out loud. Interpretation of a dream about a rainbow in a married woman’s dream. But if a married woman sees that she sees a rainbow in a dream and is happy with it, then she will face problems in her life. And the dream It indicates that the problems will be removed and that she will be safe after fear, and God knows best. As for when a married woman sees a rainbow after rain in the sky, the dream indicates relief from worries and relief from a major crisis in her life, and God Almighty knows best. Interpretation of seeing a rainbow in a dream for a woman A divorced woman, but when a divorced woman sees that she is looking at the sky and sees a rainbow in it, she admires its beautiful colors. The dream indicates that she will accept a new stage in her life. You will receive good and happy news that will change the course of her life, and God knows best. But if a divorced woman sees that she sees a rainbow in the sky after the rain It indicates that she has achieved goodness and happiness in her life after sadness and fatigue, and that she has been freed from fear, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. The interpretation of seeing a rainbow in a dream about a man and its meaning. But if a person sees in a dream that he sees a rainbow in the sky and admires it very much, the dream indicates that he He will obtain good and abundant wealth in his life, and perhaps pay off debts in his life, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. But if someone sees rain in a dream, a rainbow will appear in the dream. The dream shows that he is reassured about something that he initially feared, and that God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. The meaning of a rainbow in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. But if a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is looking at the sky and sees a rainbow. The dream indicates that she will give birth to a beautiful child, and God Almighty knows best. But if a pregnant woman sees that rain is falling abundantly, and immediately after that a rainbow appears in the sky. The dream shows peace of mind because she is afraid of some things in her life, and God Almighty is Most High and All-Knowing. Also follow: Interpretation of a dream about someone receiving dates or eating them. Interpretation of seeing a rainbow in a dream for young people and its meaning. But if a young man dreams in a dream, he sees a rainbow in the sky. It indicates The dream indicates that he is accepting a new and happy stage in his life and that God will grant him success in his life and that God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. But if a young man sees in a dream a rainbow immediately after the rain, the dream indicates dealing with a problem in one’s life and great relief from some worries, and God Almighty The highest and most knowledgeable. Interpretation of seeing a rainbow in a dream for a single woman. As for seeing a rainbow for a young girl

title: Interpretation of a dream about a knife in the left hand in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about being stabbed with a dagger in his left hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Stabbing with a dagger or knife is one of the frightening things that can cause harm to others in normal life and can also be registered as one of the crimes for which the law is accountable, as they are considered white weapons, and have spread widely in Countries, and this is what makes the dreamer feel anxious when there are such dreams in a dream, and thus we will learn about them. With the interpretation of a dream about being stabbed with a dagger in Ibn Sirin’s left hand as follows: Interpretation of a dream about a knife in the left hand in a dream according to Ibn Sirin The vision of being stabbed with a dagger in the left hand has many connotations that are controlled by the aspects of the dream, as its aspect can hurt the person, which is a bit frightening. For people, so interpreters interpreted this dream with many interpretations. As follows: Whoever sees in a dream that he stabbed himself with a knife in his right hand, this is a sign of harm from one of the close witnesses, and God knows best. If you see the knife in your right hand with a knife in a dream, this is a sign that the viewer is being robbed, and God Almighty is high. The same applies to whoever sees that someone stabbed him. With a knife in his hand, this is evidence of deception and deception, and God Almighty is high. See also: Interpretation of a dream of white clouds in a dream for pregnant women and single women in detail. Interpretation of a dream of a knife in his right hand in a dream. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a ladder that Ibn Sirin destroyed?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase: The staircase means the staircase, and it is one of the foundations of the house. Without it, a person cannot move from one floor to another. When the dreamer sees the staircase in a dream, he asks about its interpretation and if he sees it. Devastated, then afraid and afraid of this vision, and scholars believe that the interpretation of this dream is not good and that it is a matter of Mazmum, and in this article we consider together the most important things that the interpreters said about this dream. Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase. Scientists believe that seeing a sick person in a dream on a broken staircase means that he is about to die and must repent to God. If a merchant sees a broken staircase in his dream, this means that he will lose a lot of money, and perhaps the entire project he is working on. He says Commentators say that the vision is a staircase destroyed by unexpected visions that carry unpleasant connotations. When the dreamer sees the damaged staircase in his dream, this means that he will be exposed to many problems and misfortunes that he cannot get rid of. If the sleeper sees the broken staircase in a dream, this indicates multiple traps and obstacles. In his life that prevents him from reaching what he wants. But if the dreamer sees the broken staircase, and at the end of it there is a way out, this portends the achievement of goals after hardships and hardships. And when the dreamer sees himself descending the broken staircase to exit from the place he entered, then this shows The mood of troubles and misfortunes that he suffered. Interpretation of a dream about a broken staircase by Ibn Sirin. The respected scholar believes that when the dreamer sees the broken staircase and climbs it quickly and does not fall into it, this means that he will face many problems to which he will be exposed. But if the dreamer sees the damaged staircase made of leather, this means that He has committed many sins in his life and must repent to God. When the dreamer sees a broken staircase, it shows that he knows many hateful qualities, the hardness of his heart and wants evil for others. And if the dreamer sees a broken staircase in his dream and tries to climb it, this indicates that he will face many difficulties. And obstacles in his life, but in the end he will reach his goal. Also, the dreamer’s vision of a damaged and broken staircase indicates that he is looking for something that is not good in his life, so he must review it himself and not rush. The respected scholar, may God have mercy on him, confirms that a broken staircase in a dream is dreams that do not bode well. With goodness. The Asrar website for the interpretation of dreams is a site specialized in the interpretation of dreams in the Arab world. Just write: A site about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream of a broken staircase for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is climbing a broken staircase, this is a sign that she She will go through many unsuccessful experiences and will have to be patient. If the fiancée sees the broken stairs in her dream, this means that she will end her relationship with her fiancé. If the dreamer is studying and sees the broken stairs in the dream, this symbolizes failure in studying. And in the event that the girl returns and descends the broken stairs After repairing it, this tells her that she will be blessed with a good husband and her life will change for the better. When the girl sees that she is climbing the broken stairs and succeeds

title: Interpretation of a dream about hair lice for married, single, and pregnant women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about hair lice for married, single, and pregnant women. There are many dreams that we see in a dream, and since each dream has many different interpretations and connotations related to it, it is interpreted based on many things and details about the dream as well as the social status of the dreamer in the dream, and one of these dreams is a dream. Lice, because it is considered an annoying dream, because lice are considered undesirable things in reality, and seeing them in a dream has many different interpretations and connotations. We will learn about it in our article for today, which is titled Interpretation of a dream about hair lice for married, single, and pregnant women, because it is one of the common dreams that people have. Many people in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a single woman. During this article we learned about the interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for a married and pregnant woman. In this paragraph we would like to learn about the interpretation of a dream about lice in the hair for an unmarried woman, as it is among the dreams that many people fear. , that lice is undesirable and praiseworthy in reality is the same as in a dream. We will learn this in the following interpretations, which are as follows: If she sees lice spreading in her hair, this is a sign that she will be delayed in life because she will marry at a late age. Whereas if an unmarried girl sees that there are lice on her head, this dream indicates that it is possible for this girl To marry a man who does not make her happy, because she will live a full life with that man. Of sadness, torment, pain and suffering, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of dreaming of a white dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabul: The appearance of lice in a dream. Lice is considered one of the most dangerous things that can infect the scalp, as this insect is one of the dangerous insects that causes many diseases to humans. There are many ways to get rid of this parasite and its appearance in a married woman’s dream. The woman, when she is at the beginning of her marriage, is one of the things that cause her great anxiety and fear about the interpretation of the vision and appearance of lice in a married woman’s dream. Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about lice in a married woman’s hair. Ibn Sirin, the main interpreter of dreams, provided a detailed interpretation of the dream of a wife who saw lice in her hair, and we will present This interpretation is complete in this topic. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing lice in a married woman’s hair as a good vision for the woman, especially if she kills him in a dream, as this indicates the collapse of problems and worries and almost relief. Ibn Sirin also explained that when lice bites the wife in a dream, this indicates On the presence of an enemy for her, or she will find some problems, such as poverty and lack of money. When the wife in a dream picks up lice and throws it away from her, this indicates that she will commit a sin that is contrary to the Sunnah and the law of God. All of these multiple interpretations of seeing lice in the wife’s dream were presented by one of the interpreters of Dreams pioneer, the interpreter Ibn Sirin, who published many dream interpretation books and has many different interpretations of dreams. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing death again in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the death of a dead person again in a dream by Ibn Sirin If one sees in a dream, seeing the death of a person buried for a long time, this indicates the death of sadness, distress and anxiety for the seer. Similarly, the respected scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says: Seeing the death of a person at the hands of one of his relatives indicates the repayment of accumulated debts. It also indicates that this vision may indicate the collapse of problems and disputes that occur between relatives and they live in happiness and peace. Perhaps also, seeing the death of the deceased again in a dream indicates that the dreamer will join a new job and the large amount of money and profits he earns. Interpretation of seeing a dead person die in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees a vision of the death of a dead person and this person is unknown, then this vision indicates the betrayal she found from her lover. Also, if an unmarried girl sees herself killing a dead person in a dream, then this vision indicates that she has many worries and she is a materialistic girl. Also, seeing the death of a dead person in a dream, and that person was her father, indicates that the back is broken and the barrier and that she wants someone to protect her. Interpretation of seeing the dead person die again in a dream for a married woman Interpretation of seeing A dead husband returns in a dream, this indicates her lack of resourcefulness and her need to achieve what her husband wanted in his life. Seeing the dead return again in a dream for a married woman is one of the desired visions and an indication for her that she is about to get rid of her problem and get what she wants. Interpretation of seeing a dead father die again If one sees in a dream that his son dies again after his death for a long time, this indicates that he is in dire need of him, not a child, and God knows best. Also, seeing the father die again indicates the death of worries and repentance for sins, transgressions and obscenities that the dreamer was doing in his life. This vision also indicates good deeds, closeness to God, a new job, and an abundance of livelihood from lawful money, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the dead return to life and then die If one sees in a dream that he died and then returned to life, this shows his strong connections with God Almighty and shows his faith in God. Also, seeing a stranger die and then return to life indicates differences in one’s life and personal problems. Also, seeing the death of a person in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the success and excellence that she will achieve in her life and achieve Desires. Seeing the dead grandfather die again in a dream If one sees in a dream that the deceased grandmother dies again, this indicates the good condition of the dreamer and God knows best. Also, this vision for an unmarried woman indicates her blessed and righteous marriage to the right person for her, God willing. This vision also indicates for a pregnant woman that she will give birth to a peaceful child free from any disease, healthy and the most beautiful in the face. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Learn about the interpretation of the oud in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Oud in a dream is considered one of the best types of incense that many people prefer, because of its beautiful smell, and when you see it in a dream it can indicate the goodness and blessing that the dreamer will have for the coming period, but if the dreamer sees that he is smoking the house with oud, this indicates the good wife that he will provide. The dreamer. What a dream: Seeing wood in a dream and smelling good, this means that he heard the good news. However, if the dreamer sees that he is planting aloes in the house, then it is one of the visions that indicate nourishment with good offspring, and it may also be. He mentioned his first child. A person’s dream of smoking firewood is evidence of the morals and good reputation by which people are known.. Ibn Sirin’s oud in a dream. The interpreter scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that when a person sees incense in a dream with firewood, this indicates that he will be blessed with an abundance of goodness and livelihood. Seeing it Smelling the scent of incense in a dream is evidence that he hears a lot of good news, and that is why he enters his house with joy and happiness. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he is making the oud himself, this indicates achieving his goals and achieving all the aspirations that he has been seeking for a while. Yuti in Al-Osaimi’s dream, if The fortuneteller was sick and saw the oud in a dream, this indicates a speedy recovery. As for dreaming that frankincense comes out of another stick, this indicates that you will be blessed with good offspring in the near future. And returning to God Almighty. Interpretation of seeing the oud in a dream by Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen interprets the dreamer’s dream of the oud as an indication that he will receive a lot of happy news that will make him very happy. If a person sees the oud in his dream, this is a sign of his ability to achieve many things that he dreamed of. For a long time. If the dreamer watches the oud during his sleep, this expresses the abundant goodness that he will receive from the fear of God Almighty in all his actions. Watching the dreamer in a dream about the oud symbolizes that he will obtain a lot of money as a result of his business flourishing to a great extent. If a person sees wood in his dream and it smells good, this is a sign of his good behavior among people because he has a virtuous character. Through Google, you can join us on the dream interpretation website on the Internet and you will find everything you are looking for. What is in a single woman’s dream? If the girl is engaged and dreams of buying incense And the oud, then she will get married soon. But when the girl sees that she smells the scent of oud and inhales it strongly, this means that she has heard some good news that will take her to a life full of happiness and optimism. Oud also indicates good luck in the dream of single people. Seeing a sick girl with oud in a dream, will She will recover soon and enjoy good health. If she is suffering from some financial crises and sees the smell of oud filling the place in a dream, this indicates that she will soon get out of this crisis and pay all her debts. Dreaming of a girl scented with oud is evidence of the good behavior for which she is famous in the world.
